allow: Bash(ssh root@72.60.208.226 "cd ~/fairy && echo ''SECURE_SSL_REDIRECT=False'' >> .env && docker compose restart backend")

Bash(ssh root@72.60.208.226 "cd ~/fairy && docker compose exec backend python -c ""from django.conf import settings; print(''DEBUG:'', settings.DEBUG); print(''SECURE_SSL_REDIRECT:'', settings.SECURE_SSL_REDIRECT)""")
